dict.acceptation: 一般地，通常；广泛地，普遍地；概括地；主要地；

sent.orig: We are generally content, generally at peace, generally optimistic and with good reason.
sent.trans: 我们通常是满足的，通常是平和的，通常是乐观的，我们这样做有着很好的理由。

sent.orig: Buildings generally protrude above the ground and their roofs are generally composed of plane surfaces.
sent.trans: 建物一般均高出地面且其屋顶是由平面所构成。

sent.orig: Generally speaking,we hold all dispute can be settled amicably by negotiation.Arbitration is generally the last resort.
sent.trans: 一般来说，我们坚持一切争议都可通过友好协商来解决。仲裁通常是最后一著。

sent.orig: Lahu social freedom in love, marriage and family generally within marriage, generally from the UN-wife.
sent.trans: 拉祜族恋爱社交自由，婚姻一般为族内婚，普遍实行从妻居。

sent.orig: This is generally generally true of American schools, especially at the undergraduate level.
sent.trans: 这在美国的学校是普遍存在的事实，特别是对大学生群体。
